alert.note: Alert for Southeast Van Buren County; Van Buren County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:59PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Van Buren County through 630 PM CDT... At 558 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Dabney, or 17 miles west of Clinton, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clinton... Dabney... Choctaw... Alread... Rupert... Crabtree... Choctow Recreation Area... Scotland... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Southeast Van Buren County; Van Buren County Higher Elevations
